channel.title: Gauntlet Video Roundup Post - February 4, 2022
channel.description:
Greetings, all! [This week's Gauntlet Calendar video roundup post](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/blog/gauntlet-video-roundup-february-4-2022) is now up on The Gauntlet Blog! This week we've got sessions of these great games:
* _Apocalypse World Burned Over_ * _Delta Green_ * _Godbound_ * _Monsterhearts 2_ * _Old School Essentials_ * _The Twilight Throne and the Houses of Ruin_
Thanks go out to all this week's facilitators and players. If you want to join in the fun, head over to the [Gauntlet Calendar category](https://forums.gauntlet-rpg.com/c/gauntlet-calendar) on the Forums to see the latest game announcements, and sign up on the [Gauntlet Calendar](https://gauntletcalendar.com/events) to play!

item.title: Gauntlet Video Roundup Post - February 4, 2022

item.description:
@flatvurm wrote:

Greetings, all! This week’s Gauntlet Calendar video roundup post is now up on The Gauntlet Blog! This week we’ve got sessions of these great games:

  • Godbound
  • Monsterhearts 2
